titles.main_d_subtitle: The newest discussions in the forum
titles.tag_d_subtitle: The newest discussions in the {tag} tag

full-text.label: Full-Text Feeds
full-text.help: If disabled, feeds will only contain excerpts of posts, and users will have to go to the forum to read everything. I would recommend to leave this option active in order to respect the people following the forum from an RSS aggregatorâ€”if any.

html.label: Formatted Feeds
html.help: Check this to keep the HTML in the generated feeds. If disabled, the feeds will be in plain text.

forum-icons.label: Show Atom/RSS feed links on the forum
forum-icons.help: Displays icons in All Discussions, Tags and Discussions to allow easy access to the feed(s).

forum-link-format.label: Forum feed format
forum-link-format.help: Select which format (Atom or RSS) should be used when the links are displayed on the forum.
